title.rendered: Mark Van Drunen, MAI Regional President, Appears in U.S. News & World Report

content.rendered:
Regional President and Managing Director Mark Van Drunen, CFP® shared his insights on what required minimum distributions are, strategies for minimizing them, and more in a recent U.S. News article.

Read now: How to Take Required Minimum Distributions

By clicking on the above link, you will leave MAI’s site and will be directed to a third-party site which MAI does not endorse and is not affiliated.  Some third-party sites require registration or subscription to view content.  Please see MAI’s disclosure page for more information.
